text: If you wish to cancel your order, please contact us within 3 hours of placing your order. After 3 hours, we might be unable to cancel your order, change your address, or change your order. Cancellations received after 3 hours will incur a â‚¦10K restocking fee or 20% of the item value depending on which is greater. Customized orders are non-refundable and non-exchangeable. Cancellations of custom orders will incur a 50% fee of the total order value. If your order has shipped, it cannot be cancelled. If an exchange or cancelation is approved after the item is in transit, refunds cannot be issued for shipping costs. Eligibility for Returns & Exchanges Please inspect your order upon receiving it and contact us immediately within 24 hours of delivery if you received a defective, damaged, or wrong item was sent to you. Customers have 7 days to make a return or exchange request after the item is delivered. Once your request for a return has been approved, make sure you return the item with its original package intact within 7-days of approval. We will send you a shipping label to return the item or send a courier to pick up. To be
